mapper.select: SELECT rsvusrcmt.id , rsvusrcmt.product_id , rsvusrcmt.reservation_info_id , rsvusrcmt.score , rsvusrcmt.comment , rsvinfo.reservation_email , rsvinfo.reservation_date , rsvusrcmt.create_date , rsvusrcmt.modify_date FROM reservation_user_comment rsvusrcmt , reservation_info rsvinfo WHERE rsvinfo.id = rsvusrcmt.reservation_info_id AND rsvusrcmt.product_id = #{productId}
